phrases: and tries to hurt you with cruel words,
even if the world does not try to believe you
and places a crown of thorns upon your head,
I can take your side, and yours alone
I know your pain and loneliness
So everything that makes me whole
I will give that to you now
These days you love me no more
nor am I still treasured by you
What did you tell me when we parted?
The words hung in midair and never reached me
I know my dreams and wishes are illusory
and yet I cannot give up on them
You said, Do not let go, hold onto my hand
and, We will always be together
Your hands as I held them were warm
These days you love me no more
nor am I still treasured by you
What did you tell me when we parted?
The words hung in midair and never reached me
I know my dreams and wishes are illusory
and yet I cannot give up on them
You said, Do not let go, hold onto my hand
and, We will always be together
Your hands as I held them were warm
There is no need to blame yourself.
You are only human, are not you?
It seems as though we have a bingo.
Okay, I am going to start filming!
Scene where the heroine finds out about her lover's death, take five!
Is not it bad for the leader to be gone that long?
Some matters cannot be settled unless I go in person.
Behave yourself and enjoy school for a while.
Yeah, yeah, I will be a good boy.
He is like a different person.
A vacation on a southern island!
And so the young man climbs the stairway to adulthood!
Life really does not go the way we want it to, does it?
I even went to the orphanage, but they say he has not visited.
We used to play there together all the time as kids, too...
What I am looking for is at the aquarium?
I am not looking for a fish, you know...
Um, Your lucky item of love is a tiger-striped tea kettle.
Where are you supposed to find that?
Huh, so you two have not gone home yet?
Souta's using it for the film.
It is the lover's... memento, I guess?
Anyway, he says he is going to have Inori hold it.
I forgot something in the club room!
I will go deliver this for you, so you go shopping with Hare for me, okay?
What does she mean, lucky chance?
I am told there is a ghost about.
Someone entered the Oshima lab with Dr. Ouma Kurosu's ID.
Dr. Keido Shuichiro, you were once close colleagues.
Will you have lots of bags?
I wonder if we will be able to carry them all...
Is that all you have to say to me?
What do you want me to say?
You want to air everything out right here?
Hare, I need you to go shopping by yourself, please.
There is something I want to talk with Yahiro about.
They told me they were going to put Jun down.
So we took advantage of the confusion and ran away.
I figured I could not let him stay there any longer.
I sold you out to get us into that place,
and in the end I ran away from it.
We have acquired the fugitive Cancerous.
Do you really need my Endlave for a simple little Cancerous hunt?
You know what they say, a dragon goes full force even against a slime!
Like a dragon would seriously eat a slime...
We will clear this mission with guts!
It is called knowing how to get ahead.
Could you lend me some money?
We need money to run and eat.
Is that why you went out of your way to show Jun to me?
I am the only one left who can protect him.
I have someone I want you to harbor.
You need to talk to Shibungi, and then we will give you the ord
We are heading to Point Yellow-One now.
Pick us up there in an hour.
This does not mean I have forgiven you for what you did.
Jun has not done anything wrong.
We will have to use this very soon.
Sorry, June Bear with it for just a little while, okay?
So they have finally come out.
Are you ready for gene capture?
But why use something like this?
Is it wrong to want to get to know the person you are in love with?
How have they found us already?!
D'ya think the Undertakers are back or something?
This has to be a trap.
Opening up an escape route and luring in the enemy is a basic tactic.
If you keep thinking like an amateur, you are going to die.
What did you just try to do?!
I have a Void on my side.
I have the power to draw poeple's hearts out as weapon.
I can even take down an Endlave.
You are telling me to believe that?
You sure you are not the one who called in those guys?
I do not betray people like you do.
And I will make sure Jun escapes, just like I promised.
All you have to do is shut up and let me use you!
You do not need to worry.
Jun, I will be right back!
But today, I have got something special!
This thing will follow that light.
How about some continuous fire, then?
This is unexpected, but I must say it is intriguing.
That object and the Apocalypse Cancer displayed the same reading...
How can I ever explain this to Yahiro?!
Did the Apocalypse Virus because genomic resonance in the machine?
I will input every last one!
Major Segai, you are in danger!
Please move away from the action!
This is a one-time deal, got it?
It was the happiest time of my life.
Lost Christmas is about to happen.
I want to be on my way now, and just take this one happy memory with me.
Shu... please use that Void to cut off my life.
My brother's Void is the Void that severs life.
It is the Void to lay my body to rest with.
The crystals that stole my freedom
gave me the ability to see Voids in return.
And I saw there was another big brother besides the one he showed me.
I will order you the tomato one you like, okay?
I have seen unkind sides to kind people over and over.
Friends, ladies in our family, people from the health center...
And you are probably the same, Shu.
If I live any longer, this sadness will hit me again and again.
I will end up hating my brother.
I want to go out as the me who loves my wonderful big brother.
It is okay; your big brother is here for you.
I will be here for you forever!
At this rate, I will end up killing my brother!
Brother... was it a nuisance having me around?
Well, here is how I feel about you!
Life does not go the way we want it to, does it?
I am the one who killed him.
